Articles.Content:
Okay, i got an idea from this page:http://facepunch.com/showthread.php?t=1270399

starting with a background template we should develop houses and huts and things from the ground up, each adding his own little addition.

Rules:

1) Add things in technological progression (i.e. no stone buildings before a mine etc)

2) Have fun

3) No ruining other peoples stuff for the sake of it

4) NO .JPEG IMAGES

5) It's pixel art but if you think you want to make something but think you're a bad drawer send it to me or someone else via pm and we'll refine it for you

6) no anti-aliasing

7) 1 addition per post

Ill start with a template:

A small grass hut to begin with.
So...we copy your picture and then add to it, then the next person copies it, or we upload our own picture than you add it to the orgianl?
First one looks way better
bump, anyone interested?
Added stuff.
Added another hut
A stream is created and fenceposts dug into the ground
Added a Farm in the fenced area
Added an iron reserve and enabled the possibility to create stone houses. What's this? Foreigners...

Them again...

Town hall upgraded to defend against the foreigners. If they are hostile

They used this new fangled 'stone' to make the upgrade. T'is very good at no falling or burning down, sadly one villager called it witchcraft and ran away.

Edited December 25, 2013 by FlamingPotatoes
Planted trees along the river bank, primitive flood protection in about 15 years:D.
Added a bunch of stuff: First wooden house, A cow wandered in, a new farm and chopped down 1 tree!
For some reason, a bridge has been constructed over the river.

Okay, two questions before I start getting into this:

1. Can we modify/refine existing structures at will? (i.e., "renovate" existing buildings)

2. We're just using MSPaint or similar tools, aye? No photoshop and so forth? (I feel it would detract from the communal quality if there're people using more advanced tools, but maybe it's just me)
Added a well connected to the road.
Added a cobblestone road to the mine for easier delivery.
Damn, you guys are good painters!

Okay, two questions before I start getting into this:

1. Can we modify/refine existing structures at will? (i.e., "renovate" existing buildings)

2. We're just using MSPaint or similar tools, aye? No photoshop and so forth? (I feel it would detract from the communal quality if there're people using more advanced tools, but maybe it's just me)

Yes and Yes!

Edit: also

more deforestation, a growth spurt for the saplings and more wood huts!

Edited December 28, 2013 by FlamingPotatoes
The crops in the field are growing, but perhaps need a bit of TLC, looking a bit wild. That cow needs some better pasture before it gnaws the grass back into dirt :/
Bump bump bump
Good game, I'll see if I can draw anything.
The villagers starts to expand the pasture, and the grass are still growing
I've added a smelting hut, so now we can get copper and other minerals...
This looks kinda fun actually, but i'm afraid the map will need to be expanded.
Those plants are growing, and I also added chopper made from iron so wood could be chopped easier.
